report.title: MNHNL Dynamic 2 SubSamples List
report.description: Form Internal Report: Used by the Subsamples grid to retrieve the subsamples associated with a survey/supersample.
report.query: SELECT s.id, s.entered_sref as place, (ARRAY(select t.taxon FROM occurrences o INNER JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id INNER JOIN taxa t ON ttl.taxon_id = t.id WHERE o.sample_id = s.id AND o.deleted = FALSE ))::text as taxa FROM samples s WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id = #parent_id# #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: parent_id
param.description: Parent supersample id to return data for?
